Career Opportunities at Market Leader

[/et_pb_slide][/et_pb_fullwidth_slider][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”section” _builder_version=”4.6.6″ custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”||0px||false|false” bottom_divider_style=”curve2″ bottom_divider_color=”#f4f4f4″ bottom_divider_flip=”vertical”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ _builder_version=”4.6.6″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.6.6″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_image src=”/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/careerIcon1.jpg” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.6.6″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default”]

Our People

Collaborative. Curious. Driven. Diverse. Our team members make Market Leader a great place to work.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.6.6″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_image src=”/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/careerIcon2.jpg” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.6.6″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default”]

Opportunities

We don’t just offer jobs, we offer careers. Bring your ambition and we will work with you to grow.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.6.6″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_image src=”/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/careerIcon3.jpg” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.6.6″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default”]

Our Culture

We work hard and play hard. We have crafted a dynamic, fun and open environment where we can be ourselves.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”row” _builder_version=”4.6.6″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”||0px||false|false”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Text” _builder_version=”4.6.6″ background_color=”#ffffff” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” border_width_all=”1px” border_color_all=”#c6c6c6″ use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”]

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.6.6″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#f4f4f4″][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ _builder_version=”4.6.6″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.6.6″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_image src=”/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/careerLifestyle1.png” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.6.6″ _module_preset=”default” max_width=”231px”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default” hover_enabled=”0″ sticky_enabled=”0″]

Health and Wellbeing

  • Health, Dental, and Vision
  • Employee Assistance
  • Wellbeing Program

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.6.6″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_image src=”/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/careerLifestyle2.png” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.6.6″ _module_preset=”default” max_width=”231px”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default” hover_enabled=”0″ sticky_enabled=”0″]

Financial Benefits

  • 401k Plan
  • Life and Disability Insurance
  • Stock Ownership Program

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.6.6″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_image src=”/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/careerLifestyle3.png” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.6.6″ _module_preset=”default” max_width=”231px”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default” hover_enabled=”0″ sticky_enabled=”0″]
